data.title: How do I find a show or episode on the app? â€” VH1 Help Center
data.meta_description: Browse the main menu of the app or website to find featured shows, unlocked episodes, video clips, and Pluto TV channels. Featured carousels
data.text:
Browse the main menu of the app or website to find featured shows, unlocked episodes, video clips, and Pluto TV channels.

Featured carousels highlighting a particular show or theme will change seasonally, but you can find all of the shows in alphabetical order under "All Shows."

Tap the magnifying glass icon to search for a show title.

Tap the show tile to view the Episodes or Extras menus. Shows with multiple available seasons will display a dropdown arrow next to the season number. Tap an episode to play it. Based on rights and restrictions, not all seasons and episodes may be available.

Locked episodes and Live TV can be unlocked by signing in to a participating TV provider account with the channel in its subscription package.
